name: Annihilape
flavorText: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.

next.name: Clodsire
next.flavorText: When attacked, this Pokémon will retaliate by sticking thick spines out from its body. It’s a risky move that puts everything on the line.

pokemon.name: Mankey
pokemon.flavorText:
Extremely quick to
anger. It could
be docile one moment then
thrashing away
the next instant.

pokemon.name: Primeape
pokemon.flavorText:
Always furious
and tenacious to
boot. It will not abandon chasing
its quarry until
it is caught.

pokemon.name: Annihilape
pokemon.flavorText: When its anger rose beyond a critical point, this Pokémon gained power that is unfettered by the limits of its physical body.
